name: avalynx-lightbox
title: AvalynxLightbox
description: AvalynxLightbox is a simple, lightweight, and easy-to-use lightbox library. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.

author.name: Juergen Schwind and the Avalynx-Lightbox authors

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist; shx mkdir -p dist/js/; shx cp src/js/avalynx-lightbox.js dist/js/avalynx-lightbox.js; shx cp src/js/avalynx-lightbox.js dist/js/avalynx-lightbox.esm.js; node build.js dist/js/avalynx-lightbox.esm.js
